title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Feedback-Based Language Learning Strategies for Scientific Domain Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science terminology and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized feedback strategies reflecting learner characteristics and cultural backgrounds in science-language learning processes
Learners can analyze progress using LMS-based assessment tools and apply insights to strategic improvements
Learners can enhance communication skills by over 20% by integrating digital content with real-world science cases into feedback systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
